string-array.name: whats_new_277
string-array.item: Auto backups can be stored on cloud backend

string-array.name: whats_new_275
string-array.item: Synchronization across devices via cloud services

string-array.name: whats_new_271
string-array.item: Problems with plans on Samsung devices are fixed

string-array.item: Transaction form allows to create recurrence directly

string-array.name: whats_new_268
string-array.item: Setup of recurring and future transactions made easier.

string-array.item: Sorting of templates, categories and accounts made easier

string-array.item: Account balance can be copied to clipboard
Help for date format in export dialog

string-array.item: Transfers between accounts with different currencies

string-array.name: whats_new_262
string-array.item: Days where week and month start can be configured
